data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Dire Dawa, Ethiopia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dire Dawa, Ethiopia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 607,300 people living in Dire Dawa through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 109,126 believers in Dire Dawa to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 498,174 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 109,126 believers in the state of Dire Dawa to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Somali, Garre people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 109,126 believers in Dire Dawa, Ethiopia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 109,126 believers in Dire Dawa to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Dire Dawa, Ethiopia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Dire Dawa
location.people_groups_list: Gujarati, K'abeena, Somali, Oromo, Bale, Hamar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gujarati (3,400), K'abeena (86,000), Somali (7,280,000), Oromo, Bale (2,086,000), Hamar (76,000)
